subtasks: Measure the height of the sunflower to the middle of the head.
Count the number of green brackets around the back of the sunflower head.
Wait until the sunflower seeds are mature, with black or partially black seeds visible.
Use scissors to remove the sunflower head when mature, being cautious.
Brush off the sunflower head to expose the seeds for counting.
Count the number of clockwise spirals on the sunflower head.
Count the number of counter-clockwise spirals on the sunflower head.
Use photography and computer software for accurate spiral counting.
Compare the results to Fibonacci numbers, noting patterns and exceptions.
